content:
Sure, here are 5 more guest posting websites for the niche of fresh cut fruit subscription based in Mumbai:

| # | Broad Topics | Website | Email | Tip |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Food, Health, Nutrition | India Food Network | [content@indiafoodnetwork.in](mailto:content@indiafoodnetwork.in) | Share recipes and health tips featuring fresh cut fruit |
| 2 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Cookpad India | [in\_info@cookpad.com](mailto:in_info@cookpad.com) | Submit unique and creative recipes featuring fresh cut fruit |
| 3 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Sanjeev Kapoor | [connect@sanjeevkapoor.com](mailto:connect@sanjeevkapoor.com) | Pitch innovative ways to use fresh cut fruit in Indian cuisine |
| 4 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Hebbar's Kitchen | [contactus@hebbarskitchen.com](mailto:contactus@hebbarskitchen.com) | Share simple yet tasty recipes featuring fresh cut fruit |
| 5 | Food, Cooking, Recipes | Indian Food Freak | [info@indianfoodfreak.com](mailto:info@indianfoodfreak.com) | Write about unique fruit-based desserts or drinks offered by Mumbai-based restaurants |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
